column4: I think his problem is that Ubuntu doesn't play well with nVidia Optimus (or, dedicated + integrated graphics). I have the same problem, Ubuntu KILLS my battery
On Windows I can get up to 6 hours from my Acer running very similar components as Suhel
So do I on my Acer but on dell xps no. In fact I know someone's dell mini that had a battery that died in a year
Suhel: huh, guess they do suck. Guess you could get an after market battery Suhel
